instructions.total_questions_to_answer: Answer any FOUR questions including question No.1 which is compulsory.
other_instructions: The figures in the right-hand side indicate full marks.
All parts of a question should be answered at one place only.

instructions.questions_per_section_constraint: Attempt any Four questions from Section B.
